name: formula
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: formula
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a standard or accepted way of doing or making something

example.eg: We have changed the formula of the washing powder.
example.egtrans: 我们已经更换了洗衣粉的配方。

example.eg: There's no magic formula for success.

trans_examp.trans_en: a mathematical rule expressed in a set of numbers and letters

example.eg: He developed a formula for calculating the area of a triangle.
example.egtrans: 他发明了计算三角形面积的公式。

dsense.name: formula
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a series of letters and symbols that show what substances make up a particular chemical element or compound

example.eg: We had to learn chemical formulas at school, but I can only remember H2O for water.
example.egtrans: 我们上学时都得学习化学分子式，但是我现在只记得得 H2O 代表的是水。

dsense.name: formula
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a type of milk that can be given to babies instead of milk from their mother
